verses.name: Job 37:6
verses.text: For he saith to the snow, Be thou on the earth; likewise to the small rain, and to the great rain of his strength.

verses.name: Job 37:7
verses.text: He sealeth up the hand of every man; that all men may know his work.

verses.name: Job 37:8
verses.text: Then the beasts go into dens, and remain in their places.

verses.name: Job 37:9
verses.text: Out of the south cometh the whirlwind: and cold out of the north.

verses.name: Job 37:10
verses.text: By the breath of God frost is given: and the breadth of the waters is straitened.

verses.name: Job 37:11
verses.text: Also by watering he wearieth the thick cloud: he scattereth his bright cloud:
